notes: period name often capitalized; used for the 1700s; invariable form
example_sentence_italian: il settecento è stato un periodo importante.
example_sentence_english: The eighteenth century was an important period.
It is an authentic eighteenth-century piece.

example_sentence_italian: Nei libri settecento indica il secolo.
example_sentence_english: In books settecento denotes the century.

notes: used to refer to the period collectively

example_sentence_italian: Ho trovato riferimenti a dei settecento nei documenti.
example_sentence_english: I found references to some 1700s in the documents.

example_sentence_italian: Al settecento si attribuiscono molte opere.
example_sentence_english: Many works are attributed to the eighteenth century.

example_sentence_italian: Ai settecento si dedicano molti studi.
example_sentence_english: Many studies are devoted to the 1700s.

example_sentence_italian: Le idee dal settecento influenzano ancora oggi.
example_sentence_english: Ideas from the eighteenth century still influence today.

example_sentence_italian: I documenti dai settecento sono rari.

example_sentence_english: In the eighteenth century new sciences developed.

example_sentence_italian: Nei settecento la musica cambiò molto.
example_sentence_english: In the 1700s music changed a lot.

example_sentence_italian: Ho letto un saggio sul settecento.
example_sentence_english: I read an essay about the eighteenth century.
